projects.title: Frame Fitness - Fitness Platform
projects.bodyText:
- A fitness platform based in the USA.
 - Contributed as a Freelancer on initial **development and deployment**.

projects.title: Ipurvey -  Freight management Platform
projects.bodyText:
- Next generation freight management platform.
 - Contributed in development of dynamic print **micro-service** as a Freelancer.

projects.title: Skillit - Hiring Platform
projects.bodyText:
- A US based hiring platform designed for **Construction Workers**.
 - Integrated TypeForm Quizes in their platform as a Freelancer.

projects.title: Islamopedia Books - Digitizing Archived Books
projects.bodyText:
- An **open-source** initiative to digitize archived audio books into modern accessible formats.
 - Implements AI-powered OCR and audio processing technologies.

projects.title: Dua Collections - Personal Content Delivery Platform
projects.bodyText:
- A personal content delivery platform to share **Dua Collections**.
 - A handy tool to share and access Dua collections easily.
